data.title: The command line H.264 Flash Video Converter with best quality
data.meta_description: MediaCoder Flash Video Converter is a command line utility based on MediaCoder, which can convert almost all types of video files as well as DVD/VCD tracks directly to Flash Video format with high quality and high performance.
data.text:
Features

Converting video files to latest H.264/F4V format

High quality and high performance H.264 encoding

Adjusting video parameters like resolution, frame rate

Adjusting audio parameters like sampling rate and volume gain

Trimming content by specifying start/end time

Support GPU encoding acceleration (optional)

Platform

This product works on following operating systems:

Microsoft Windows 2000

Microsoft Windows XP

Microsoft Windows Vista

Microsoft Windows Server 2003

Microsoft Windows Server 2008

Linux (Wine)

Mac OS X (Darwine)

Live Quality Demo

Please view the live demo of the flash video files produced by MediaCoder CLI for Flash Video. The overall bitrate of the demo clips are approximately 490Kbps (450Kbps for video and 40Kbps for audio).

Command Line Syntax

mc [-switch <value>] [-o <output file name>] <input file>

Switches:

-vbitrate <video bitrate in Kbps>

-abitrate <audio bitrate in Kbps>

-width <output video width in pixels>

-height <output video height in pixels>

-fps <output video frame rate>

-srate <output audio sample rate>

-startpos <start time position in ms>

-duration <duration to process in ms>

Command Line Example:

mc -vbitrate 400 -abitrate 64 -width 320 -height 240 -fps 15 -srate 22050 -startpos 5000 -o g:\out\test.f4v g:\in\test.mpg

Download & Evaluation

You can download the evaluation package of MediaCoder command line version. The evaluation version only encodes first 60 seconds of input content and does not contain CUDA support.

Besides, we also provide a generic-purpose command line version which can load a preset file generated by MediaCoder GUI version and transcodes with the settings defined in the preset file. For information about this product, please contact us.

Licensing

We provide following licensing modes.

System code licensing

A system code will be prompted in the evaluation version as the figure shown below. Please attach this code together with your payment. You will receive a copy of licensed software bound with this code.

Internet licensing

If you choose Internet licensing scheme, you need to make sure the system running the software have an Internet access. The software will check for and obtain a license from the license server on startup.

USB stick licensing

We can provide a USB stick which stores the software and is used for licensing. You will need to plug in the USB stick while using the software.

Purchase

You can use PayPal to perform the purchase. Once we receive the payment, we will send out the software via E-mail in 48 hours. If you choose USB licensing, we will send out a USB stick containing the licensed software via UPS or DHL. It usually takes about 1 week (depending on geographic location) for the USB stick to arrive. If you want to use alternative payment method or have any questions, please contact us.
